sourcesContent:
import {Component, OnInit} from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-footer", templateUrl: "./footer.component.html", styleUrls: ["./footer.component.scss"], }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { dateNow: number | undefined; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { this.dateNow = new Date().getFullYear(); } }
